product_name: Moving Comfort Urban Gym Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Take style to the studio and then to the street in the Moving Comfort Urban Gym Tank Top. Made from recycled coffee grounds, the supple fabric provides remarkable moisture management and odor control.
